医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
提供脉冲电流的生物电子设备可以帮助治疗耐药性高血压据美国心脏协会称，有几种药物可以治疗高血压，但超过 1000 万美国人对这些治疗没有反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/BioElectronic-device-that-delivers-pulsed-electricity-could-help-treat-drug-pressive-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/BioElectronic-device-that-delivers-pulsed-electricity-could-help-treat-drug-pressive-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b316fdc-1e66-44b9-b1b6-1fa579330d32 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 14:23:55 -0400 Bioelectronic device that delivers pulsed electricity could help treat drug-resistant hypertension
分子伴侣是肿瘤抑制稳定性的关键参与者2024 年 10 月 1 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新综述，题为“分子伴侣：肿瘤抑制因子稳定性和功能的守护者”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Molecular-chaperones-as-key-players-in-tumor-suppressor-stability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Molecular-chaperones-as-key-players-in-tumor-suppressor-stability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec4f862e-3a51-42bf-8e03-dd3743e1da03 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 14:18:15 -0400 Molecular chaperones as key players in tumor suppressor stability
延长 mRNA 寿命：治疗开发的进步基于 mRNA 的疗法和疫苗是对抗不治之症的新希望。信使 RNA (mRNA) 药物开发中常用的策略是基于破坏致病 mRNA。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Enhancing-mRNA-lifespan-A-step-forward-in-therapeutic-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Enhancing-mRNA-lifespan-A-step-forward-in-therapeutic-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d056bf08-8ca1-4df4-9aec-a5c5d3c57c30 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 14:13:00 -0400 Enhancing mRNA lifespan: A step forward in therapeutic development
研究发现，雄性小鼠利用雌性分散注意力来降低攻击性美国特拉华大学 Joshua Neunuebel 领导的一个研究小组利用机器学习跟踪小鼠的行为，以了解它们如何处理其他小鼠的攻击行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Male-mice-use-female-distraction-to-deescalate-aggression-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Male-mice-use-female-distraction-to-deescalate-aggression-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d79ff910-128a-49f3-8c54-2d6aeb564b8e Wed, 16 Oct 2024 14:07:07 -0400 Male mice use female distraction to deescalate aggression, study finds
研究揭示影响出生性别比的遗传因素每年，出生的男孩和女孩的数量大致相同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Study-reveals-genic-factors-affecting-birth-sex-ratios.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Study-reveals-genic-factors-affecting-birth-sex-ratios.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fb77f60-4d31-4463-a6e0-4f731f748b77 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 14:00:31 -0400 Study reveals genetic factors affecting birth sex ratios
加州大学洛杉矶分校和帕克研究所续签联盟以推进癌症免疫治疗加州大学洛杉矶分校和帕克癌症免疫治疗研究所 (PICI) 重新结盟，以推进癌症免疫治疗的研究，并加速开发针对最难治疗的癌症的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/UCLA-and-Parker-Institute-renew-alliance-to-advance-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/UCLA-and-Parker-Institute-renew-alliance-to-advance-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0a2b1ff-ac15-4e1e-9642-5d91a2ad849a Wed, 16 Oct 2024 13:40:23 -0400 UCLA and Parker Institute renew alliance to advance cancer immunotherapy
怀孕期间补充叶酸可减轻铅对儿童的神经毒性作用新研究给出了怀孕期间补充叶酸的另一个理由。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Folic-acid-supplementation-during-pregnancy-mitigates-neuroknown-effects-of-lead-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Folic-acid-supplementation-during-pregnancy-mitigates-neuroknown-effects-of-lead-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a35876db-221f-4566-b9f2-56282b4d2f99 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 13:36:40 -0400 Folic acid supplementation during pregnancy mitigates neurotoxic effects of lead in children
新的登记系统提供了对患有先天性心脏病的成年人的生活质量的见解现在，患有先天性心脏病 (CHD) 的成年人第一次通过先天性心脏病倡议 (CHI) 的数据对其长期生活质量有了宝贵的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/New-registry-offers-insights-into-quality-of-life-for-adults-with-congenital-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/New-registry-offers-insights-into-quality-of-life-for-adults-with-congenital-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7eb29b5-9bb7-4f9e-969b-c0be9a6716ea Wed, 16 Oct 2024 13:27:11 -0400 New registry offers insights into quality of life for adults with congenital heart disease
重大捐赠推动眼科人工智能的进步伊坎医学院宣布约翰和达里亚巴里基金会向眼科人工智能 (AI) 和人类健康中心捐赠 500 万美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Major-donation-fuels-advances-in-oleading-artificial-intelligence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Major-donation-fuels-advances-in-otropic-artificial-intelligence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c94f9cd4-e922-430d-a31c-2177f09bec79 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 13:16:55 -0400 Major donation fuels advances in ophthalmic artificial intelligence
突破性的发现为中毒性表皮坏死松解症患者带来了希望马克斯·普朗克生物化学研究所的一个全球研究小组取得了一项突破性的发现，挽救了患有中毒性表皮坏死松解症的患者的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Groundwriting-discovery-offers-hope-for-病人-suffering-from-毒-表皮坏死松解.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Groundwriting-discovery-offers-hope-for-病人-suffering-from-毒-epidermal-necrolysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=464f4888-02c8-4f34-aa1c-0769649c8f32 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 13:13:23 -0400 Groundbreaking discovery offers hope for patients suffering from toxic epidermal necrolysis
